summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 6, Thompson's University Addition, being the alley between 16th Avenue Northeast and 17th Avenue Northeast, from East 55th Street to East 56th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition Nos. 97666 and 96853 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
